mapper.sql: id, user_id, device_id, device_name, create_date, modify_date, deleted
mapper.delete: delete from z_user_device where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
delete from z_user_device where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
delete from z_user_device where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{0} and device_id = #{1}
mapper.insert:

id,
user_id,

deleted,

mapper.update:
update z_user_device
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update z_user_device set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
